alert.note: Alert for Decatur (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gadsden and southwestern Decatur Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 424 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Quincy, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Gretna, Littman, Juniper, Douglas City, Mount Pleasant, Hardin Heights, Rosedale, Recovery, Faceville, Santa Clara, Hardaway, Jinks, Sycamore, Quincy Airport, Sawdust and River Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
